mapper.select: SELECT max(cpu_total_pct) as cpu_pct, max(mem_use_pct) as mem_pct, max(disk_vol1_usage_pct) as disk_vol1_pct, to_char(date_trunc('min',hhmmss), 'hh24:mi') as hhmmss FROM tb_usage_system_1min WHERE hhmmss >= now() - interval '10 min' GROUP BY date_trunc('min', hhmmss) ORDER BY date_trunc('min', hhmmss) ASC;

SELECT max(cpu_total_pct) as cpu_pct, max(mem_use_pct) as mem_pct, max(disk_vol1_usage_pct) as disk_vol1_pct, to_char(date_trunc('min', hhmmss), 'dd hh24 mi') as ct_at FROM tb_usage_system_1min
hhmmss >= date_trunc('second',(#{date_start}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE))
and date_trunc('second',(#{date_end}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) > hhmmss
GROUP BY date_trunc('min', hhmmss) ORDER BY date_trunc('min', hhmmss) asc;

SELECT max(cpu_total_pct) as cpu_pct, max(mem_use_pct) as mem_pct, max(disk_vol1_usage_pct) as disk_vol1_pct, to_char(date_trunc('hour', hhmmss), 'dd hh24:mi') as ct_at FROM tb_usage_system_1min
hhmmss >= date_trunc('second',(#{date_start}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE))
and date_trunc('second',(#{date_end}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) > hhmmss
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', hhmmss) ORDER BY date_trunc('hour', hhmmss) asc;
